page.title: 06MEDIA
page.content: THE MOST POPULAR FORM OF ENTERTAINMENT AND INFORMATION SOURCE IS THE TELEVISION.MOST FAMILIES WATCH AT LEAST ONE NEWS PROGRAMME A WEEK,AND MANY PARENTS LIKE TO WATCH DOCUMENTARIES ABOUT CURRENT ISSUES.ALL THE FAMILIES QUESTIONED IN OUR SURVEY HAD AT LEAST ONE NEWSPAPER EACH DAY.THE MOST POPULAR PAPER FROM OUR SMALL SAMPLE WAS" THE SUN".SEVERAL FAMILIES TAKE EITHER" THE T.V.TIMES", OR" THE RADIO TIMES".MOST PEOPLE HAVE A NUMBER OF BOOKS AT HOME,AND THE LIBRARY IS WELL USED.LISTENING TO RECORDS IS A POPULAR HOBBY, SOME PEOPLE HAVE MUSIC CENTRES AND RECORD THEIR FAVOURITE SONGS FROM THE RADIO ONTO TAPE.CHILDREN OFTEN HAVE COMICS,THESE ARE MAINLY FICTION;OLDER CHILDREN AND ADULTS OFTEN HAVE MAGAZINES.
